snippet: The lower house of Parliament approved a law on Tuesday that would legalize same-sex marriage and give the same rights to all married couples to adopt children.
abstract: France's lower house of Parliament approves law that would legalize same-sex marriage and give same rights to all married couples to adopt children.
lead_paragraph: The lower house of Parliament approved a law on Tuesday that would legalize same-sex marriage and give the same rights to all married couples to adopt children.

headline.main: France: Assembly Passes Gay Marriage Bill
headline.print_headline: France: Assembly Passes Gay Marriage Bill

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
